creator: Simple & Easy
descriptionHtml:
Calculator Lock - HideS allows you to hide all types of files, including videos, photos and other items. It also provides you with other useful functions, including notes, video player, photo viewer, etc. You can use HideS as a private parallel space in your phone.

I. Main Features

✤ Hide videos, photos and all types of files
Your secret files will be stored in hidden space with calculator password protection and will not be shown in any other photo album, gallery or file manager.

✤ Write notes
You can write secret notes and they will be strictly protected.

✤ Video Player & Built-in Photo Viewer
You can play hidden videos inside Calculator Lock. The video player provides very convenient functions to allow you easily enjoy videos, and one-key mute to help you quickly switch in various situations.
Through Built-in Photo Viewer, you can easily view all hidden photos inside the calculator lock app.

✤ Intruder selfie
If someone tries to unlock the app with a wrong password, a photo of him will be taken.

✤ Disguised as a calculator
Your files will be secretly stored behind a calculator and can only be accessed by entering correct password.

❤️ HideS is a stunning free video vault, photo gallery lock, audio protector and privacy guard for your personal information and media files.

II. FAQ
i. How to use?
Enter your password on calculator and press = button to open.

ii. How to retrieve my password?
Please enter 123123= to reset the password. If you still have issues, please send us e-mail and our support team will contact you within 48 hours. If you cannot find the email in the Inbox, please check your Spam or Trash folders.

iii. How to retrieve my files after uninstalling the app?
If you have not modified or deleted the .hideS folder, you need to reinstall the app and use Unhide feature in the app to unlock your files before uninstalling the app.

III. IMPORTANT

❖ Your privacy is important to us! HideS Calculator - Lock Video & Photo app does not copy or store your photos and videos.

❖ Don't delete or change any files in .hideS folder(of your device root directory) before backing it up, otherwise your files will be lost forever.

❖ Don't let Clean tools delete or change any files in the folder.

❖ Remember to backup your files before factory reset or switching to a new device.

❖ In case you want to switch to a new device, you can copy entire the folder and paste it to your new device root directory.

❤️ We focus on privacy protection and we are dedicated to provide the most advanced photo locker and video hider to keep your privacy safe!

We welcome your comments or questions regarding this app. Please e-mail us at hides.smart@gmail.com

title: HideS: Lock Video, Hide Photo

container.value: 562 Tran Cung, Co Nhue, Bac Tu Liem, Ha Noi, Viet Nam

creator: Simple & Easy
descriptionHtml:
🤔 You want to have a calculator vault for protecting important datas?

HideS: Lock video, Hide photo will help you create a private space for your personal datas.
✔ Use PIN code for all data: hide photo, hide videos, protect private web browser, other types and save them in the app's hidden vault
✔ No one can see those hidden vault without you
✔ Be hidden under the simple calculator interface

🔥🔥 KEY FEATURES OF THIS SECRET CALCULATOR
🔒 Hide videos and lock photos
- Hidden pictures and videos are auto saving in a secret photo vault
- Hide photos and videos in a few seconds
- Choose to secure each file or lock all files at the same time

🔒 Create the private browser
- Bookmarks for quick searching on the next times
- Review private browser history only when entering hidden calculator password
- Access web pages as smooth as other normal browsers

🔒 Hide private notes
No one can see your private notes if you don't want to share them with others. Users do not need to set multiple passwords, just use only one password to lock all files.

🔒 Hide other important datas on your phone:
Easily put all folders of device into hidden vault, even audio personal files and recording files

🔒 Lock apps
App locker after setting PIN code, it will make your app hidden from the phone screen. You can find list of hidden app in HideS's hidden vault and use them directly

🔒 High security lock
- Only be used as a simple private calculator if lock password is not entered correctly
- Recover password lock in case of forgetting
- Automatically take a picture of an intruder in your hidden photo vault
- Automatically exit the secret calculator's interface when switching the phone's screen

How to set the password for your hidden folder?
Step 1: When opening HideS:Lock Video, Hide Photo for the first time, the application will ask you to set up a PIN code. Password lock consists of 4 digits and ends with an “=” sign. Then confirm that password.
Step 2: Choose a question and enter the answer in case you need to reset the password lock

📌 Note:
In case of deleting this photo vault, your hidden folder would disappear completely and not be restored. So make sure those hidden apps, hidden pictures, hidden gallery, etc. were restored to public status before removing them.

HideS:Lock Video, Hide Photo is a safe and highly secure app. In phone losing cases, it helps reduce the possibility of revealing important datas. This photo hinder does not store or copy hidden photos and videos in your calculator vault. It also doesn't automatically edit your hidden data lists or remove them. The HideS creates a big secret photo album and safe vault on your phone.

If you need support and answer your questions, contact our support team via email hides.smart@gmail.com
Hope you have great experiences with HideS!

title: HideS: Lock Video, Hide Photo

container.value: 562 Tran Cung, Co Nhue, Bac Tu Liem, Ha Noi, Viet Nam

creator: Simple & Easy
descriptionHtml:
Calculator Lock - HideS allows you to lock video, lock photo, lock app and all types of files. It also provides you with other useful functions, including notes, video player, photo viewer, etc. You can use HideS as a private parallel space in your phone.

I. Key Features

✤ Hide video, hide photo and all types of files
Your secret files will be stored in hidden space with calculator password protection and will not be shown in any other photo album, gallery or file manager.

✤ App Lock
You can lock apps which you don’t want people to open. App Lock can prevent leaking privacy to others.

✤ Private Browser
If you want to protect your browsing data, then using the private browser is a good choice, it can provide you with a secret and anonymous browsing experience.

✤ Take notes
You can write secret notes and they will be strictly protected.

✤ Video Player & Built-in Photo Viewer
You can play hidden videos inside Calculator Lock. The video player provides very convenient functions to allow you to easily enjoy videos, and a one-key mute to help you quickly switch in various situations.
Through the Built-in Photo Viewer, you can easily view all hidden photos inside the calculator lock app.

✤ Intruder selfie
If someone tries to unlock the app with a wrong password, a photo of him will be taken.

✤ Disguised as a calculator
Your files will be secretly stored behind a calculator and can only be accessed by entering the correct password.

❤️ HideS is a stunning free video vault, photo gallery lock, audio protector and privacy guard for your personal information and media files.

II. FAQ

How to use?
Enter your password on calculator and press = button to open.

How to retrieve my password?
Please enter 123123= to reset the password. If you still have issues, please send us an e-mail and our support team will contact you within 48 hours. If you cannot find the email in the Inbox, please check your Spam or Trash folders.

How to retrieve my files after uninstalling the app?
If you have not modified or deleted the .hideS folder, you need to reinstall the app and use Unhide feature in the app to unlock your files before uninstalling the app.

III. IMPORTANT

❖ Your privacy is important to us! HideS Calculator - Lock Video & Photo app does not copy or store your photos and videos.

❖ Don't delete or change any files in .hideS folder(of your device root directory) before backing it up, otherwise your files will be lost forever.

❖ Don't let Clean tools delete or change any files in the folder.

❖ Remember to backup your files before factory reset or switching to a new device.

❖ In case you want to switch to a new device, you can copy the entire folder and paste it to your new device root directory.

❤️ We focus on privacy protection and we are dedicated to providing the most advanced photo locker and video hider to keep your privacy safe!

We welcome your comments or questions regarding this app. Please email us at hides.smart@gmail.com
